description.value: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Adopted Ancestry]{Adopted Ancestry} general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level goblin ancestry feat.
